mapper.select: SELECT c.* ,co.id as cart_options_id ,p.name as product_name ,oi.price as option_price ,oi.name as option_name FROM carts c LEFT JOIN products p ON c.products_id = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cart_options co ON c.id = co.carts_id LEFT JOIN option_items oi ON co.option_items_id = oi.id WHERE c.users_id = #{usersId} AND p.id = #{productId} ORDER BY c.created_at desc, oi.seq asc
SELECT * FROM carts WHERE users_id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at desc
